abstract.p: Rainmaker Interactive acquires Smith Smith & Smith advertising agency; Cronin & Co acquires CPR agency (S)

block.p: Agencies are making acquisitions for undisclosed terms.

Rainmaker Interactive in Reston, Va., acquired Smith Smith & Smith in Manhattan Beach, Calif., which specializes in Web design and advertising. Smith Smith, with four employees and billings estimated at $2 million from clients like Kawasaki and Buick, will be renamed Rainmaker West. Sergio A. Bravo, 40, president and creative director at Smith Smith, becomes senior vice president and director for creative services at Rainmaker West.
Agencies are making acquisitions for undisclosed terms.

Rainmaker Interactive in Reston, Va., acquired Smith Smith & Smith in Manhattan Beach, Calif., which specializes in Web design and advertising. Smith Smith, with four employees and billings estimated at $2 million from clients like Kawasaki and Buick, will be renamed Rainmaker West. Sergio A. Bravo, 40, president and creative director at Smith Smith, becomes senior vice president and director for creative services at Rainmaker West.

Also, Cronin & Company in Glastonbury, Conn., acquired and absorbed CPR in Avon, Conn., a Web site development agency working for clients like Supermarket of Savings. Todd Gray, 37, principal and creative director at CPR, becomes director for digital services at Cronin.
